laboratory_examinations.findings: Abnormal conduction restitution in the right ventricular outflow tract (RVOT). Activation slowing was noted in the RVOT with significant interstitial fibrosis.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Progressive ECG changes noted over time, with a noted QRS widening to 160 ms at the end of 2001.

laboratory_examinations.findings: The patient was heterozygous for a nucleotide substitution in codon 1935 (G1935S mutation). This mutation was absent in 150 control individuals.
Marked hypertrophy of the right ventricular wall and focal endocardial fibroelastosis with interstitial fibrosis and fatty infiltration observed.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Intramyocardial fibrosis and adipose content were larger in the RVOT compared to other areas, indicating progressive structural changes.
